snippet: Shares rallied over 4 percent on Wednesday after the airline beat Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter profit on cheaper jet fuel and more crowded planes.
abstract: Virgin America shares rally over 4 percent in wake of company's announcement of fourth-quarter profit of $1.16 per share, which beat analyst expectations of 80 cents per share.
lead_paragraph: Shares rallied over 4 percent on Wednesday after the airline beat Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter profit on cheaper jet fuel and more crowded planes.

headline.main: Virgin America Results Handily Exceed Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Virgin America Results Handily Exceed Forecasts
